posts.post_content:
I Normally deal in autographs but recently purchased a collection of Baseball cards and other unsigned memorabilia 1909-1934, They are currently listed in my e-bay store at $14.99 min bid no reserve , the auction listings start ending in a few hours and will continue throughout the next two weeks. Hope to Welcome you aboard 
___________________________
[url]http://stores.ebay.com/Jim-Stinson-Sports[/url]
